Description:
A Hidden Coastal Gem Abbuting Deep Creek Reserve
A hidden gem located in one of Torquays most sought after locations enjoys the natural beauty of Deep Creek Reserve accessed directly from your back gate. Designed by award winning architect David Seely, the cottage style property possesses charm and is full of natural light.
What YOU'LL LOVE:
- Elevated pitched ceilings with highlight windows for maximum natural light
- Floating timber floorboards to the main living area
- Gas log fire plus s/s heating and cooling
- Feature French doors
- Upstairs master bedroom/retreat with WIR and sitting/study area and private balcony
- Brand new Stainless Steel Bosch dishwasher
- Stainless steel Westinghouse oven and ceramic electric cook top
- Under stair storage
- Plantation shutters
- Under floor heating in bathroom
- Japanese toilet with heated seat
- Beautifully landscaped with extensive feature 'crazy paving'
- Solar panels
- Undercover alfresco with brand new decking
- 350m walk to the beach and an easy level stroll to town centre
What The VENDOR LOVES:
I love this place because it is such a friendly neighbourhood. The unique design of the house maximises the natural light. The balcony is the perfect spot to sip an evening drink and watch friendly people and dogs passing by to the beach. I can walk along Deep Creek and the proximity to the beach for further walks and a pleasant stroll into Gilbert Street or a suburban stroll to the Dunes Village. Deep Creek Reserve right outside and no lawns to mow.
Internal area
157.93m²

466m2 block located on Rosella Road in Stage 13 The Dunes, Torquay.
NBN and utility connections ready - Titled, ready to build now!
Schools, shops & sporting facilities all within arms reach.

Description:
Classic Beach House in Quiet Street
The Feel:
Hidden away from busy summer tourism, yet within easy walking distance to all the village favourites, this could be your ticket to break into the Barwon Heads market or secure a holiday home. Awash with sunlight, this classic three-bedroom beach house offers a site for years of happy memories to be made. Kick back in the shade of the front verandah & enjoy a sunny northerly aspect, or utilise the backyard with potential for a SLUG studio conversion across a rarely offered 585sqm approx. Relish in the ease of life here, or consider the options for future development of this enticing site (STCA).
The Facts:
-Celebrate simplicity; weatherboard beach house in a prized quiet location
-Low maintenance abode that offers pure lifestyle for permanent or weekender
-Set on 585sqm approx. with options to explore development (STCA)
-Master bedroom located at front offers BIR & en suite with shower, bath, toilet & Tastic heater
-Two minor bedrooms, both with BIRs, located adjacent to the main bathroom
-North-facing Study for home office
-RCAC & woodfire assists comfort through the main living zone, with ceiling fan in master bedroom
-Morning sun streams into the kitchen, with ample workspace, quality appliances & storage
-Open-plan kitchen, meals & living area with durable pine flooring
-North-facing front veranda & rear deck for entertaining
-Oversized SLUG offers potential for studio conversion
-Added bonus of OSP for multiple vehicles on sealed driveway
-Easy access to walking trails to the river, beach, shops, school & popular Village Parklands
The Owner Loves.
Whats not to love about living here? We have just loved this quiet location tucked away in a wonderful neighbourhood, yet we can walk up to the beach or shops in 5 minutes."
*All information offered by Bellarine Property is provided in good faith. It is derived from sources believed to be accurate and current as at the date of publication and as such Bellarine Property simply pass this information on. Use of such material is at your sole risk. Prospective purchasers are advised to make their own enquiries with respect to the information that is passed on. Bellarine Property will not be liable for any loss resulting from any action or decision by you in reliance on the information.

Description:
Premium location in Central Highton
An exciting opportunity for a growing family to secure a charming home in an amazing location, everything you could possibly need is right at your front door. Just a short stroll down the road to the popular Highton Village, offering inviting cafes, restaurants, retail stores and daily amenities. The Barwon River walking track is close by and a bus stop for those needing public transport or travelling to school is directly across the road.
This beautifully presented four bedroom home is ideal for a family wanting access to some of the most popular schools in the zone. Montpellier & Highton Primary Schools, Clairvaux Catholic School, Belmont High School and Christian College are all within minutes. Highton Reserve offering a playground, tennis courts, lawn bowls, cricket oval & practice nets and home the Geelong Falcons Football Club is all within walking distance. Easy access to the Geelong Ring Road, Deakin University and Epworth Hospital make this central Highton location one to be desired. Sit back and relax on the balcony and enjoy the lifestyle Highton has to offer.
UPSTAIRS
• Fully renovated designer kitchen with stone bench tops, vinyl wrap cabinetry, wall oven, electric cook top, Asko dishwasher and ample storage
• Light filled dining zone
• Spacious lounge room with gas log fire, new carpet and access to the front balcony
• Three large bedrooms all with built in robes
• Central bathroom with separate toilet and shower room
• Solid timber floorboards & timber windows
• Daikin ducted heating and refrigerated cooling
DOWNSTAIRS
• Fourth bedroom with built in robes
• Oversized second living room with built in bar & electric heater
• Bathroom with shower & toilet
• Large laundry with ample storage
• Spacious backyard with pergola, established gardens and shed
• Ample off street parking and double carport. Storage room/office
If location and lifestyle are paramount in your next home, the 161 Mt Pleasant Road Highton should be on the top of your inspection list! Don't miss this wonderful opportunity to secure this magnificent home.
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.

Description:
Conveniently Located Lifestyle Property
Secure yourself a semi-rural property, set on the outskirts of the thriving suburb of Leopold this parcel of land offers a true country lifestyle, offering privacy yet still extremely close by to all you every day needs. Set on approx. 5 acres the potential is immense. Whether you are looking to spruce up the existing house, renovate to your dream home or start again with space for a pool, horses, sprawling gardens and much more (STCA).
This neat brick veneer home offers various lifestyle opportunities for the growing family. From the moment you step inside you will feel a sense of comfort. The clever design offers practical every day and family living. Comprising generously proportioned rooms, including two separate living areas complete with timber feature walls, wood heater and a split system. The updated kitchen offers electric oven and hotplates, dishwasher, plus ample bench and cupboard space and overlooks the separate dining area.
Down the hallway are all four large bedrooms offering built-in robes and are serviced by the main bathroom complete with double vanity and bath. You will also find the study attached to the large lounge/ rumpus room which is ideal for a childrens playroom.
Outdoors will leave you wanting nothing more. Comprising a covered outdoor alfresco area which is perfect for sitting back and enjoying the peace and tranquility that surrounds you. There is ample room for the kids and pets to run around and enjoy. The grounds yield a number of paddocks, stables and shelters.
Vehicle accommodation is no issue offering a double carport, as well as a workshop and tool shed for the handy buyers.
Added features include; 3.4x5.5 shed and 5kW solar system.
Situated only moments from Gateway Plaza, public transport and playgrounds plus easy access to the bustling City of Geelong, plus popular beaches located on the Bellarine Peninsula and Surf Coast, you can enjoy the best of both worlds. If you are seeking a piece of a country lifestyle but with the convenience of everyday necessities that the city life provides, then this property is for you! Dont miss this exciting opportunity.
Insights: 102-110 Como Road, Leopold VIC 3224 was last sold in 2020 and 94 other 4 bedroom house in Leopold have recently been sold.

Description:
Live the Bellarine Life
This home is gracious and spacious with a touch of luxe and resort style living. Step into the wide welcoming hallway and you will instantly feel that there is a lot to get excited about here.
With a spa bath in the en-suite, and a super sized walk-in robe, the king size master invites you to relax and slow down. A second king sized bedroom, with a private sitting area and semi en-suite access, makes the ideal guest room. While a third bedroom is adjacent to a home office or reading nook.
The open plan living zone is a highlight; it features a generous kitchen with quality appliances and plentiful space to gather with family and friends. A fully enclosed outdoor room adds even more living space and is a favourite spot to enjoy outdoor entertaining all year round. A formal lounge provides a cosy space to unwind and there is ducted heating and evaporative cooling plus a split system to ensure comfort throughout.
The double garage includes a bonus workshop area, ideal for creative or handy types. Outdoors a compact, established garden requires little maintenance. Additional outdoor living on an under cover hardwood deck is the perfect spot for summer lunches and evening BBQs.
Conveniently located in a quiet court, it is a few minutes walk to the local primary school, shops, parks and sporting reserves. Be in Geelong in 20 minutes, or make the most of the central location to soak up Bellarine beaches, wineries and laid back living.
Insights: 7 Woodleigh Close, Leopold VIC 3224 was last sold in 2014 and 101 other 3 bedroom house in Leopold have recently been sold.

Description:
An exciting home or business opportunity
For sale by Openn Negotiation (flexible conditions online auction). The Openn Negotiation is under way and the property can sell at any time. Contact Shaun or Chris immediately to become qualified and avoid disappointment. Open to all buyers including subject to finance.
Youll love:
This 652m2 allotment is in a wonderful position on the Surf Coast Highway at the entrance to Old Torquay.
With flexible zoning & excellent exposure, the property makes for ideal medical or allied health use, as well as other business/commercial opportunities (STCA).
The location is only 150m to Peachs Torquay, 350m to the main surf shop precinct and strolling distance to schools, childcare centres, public transport & more.
This exciting opportunity offers virtually unlimited potential to anyone whos looking for a new renovation project or to run their business in a high-profile location in Old Torquay!
Plus:
The large, single level home is currently residentially tenanted on a month-to-month basis.
It comprises of 3 bedrooms with BIRs (with ensuite to main), plus the main living room, kitchen/dining area, a formal entry, central bathroom/laundry and a separate toilet.
Theres air-conditioning (x2) and central ducted heating too.
The well-maintained block also has a large garage/workshop on it plus room to create allocated parking for up to 8 cars.

Description:
Ultimate Sustainable Lifestyle Opportunity on the Surf Coast
This spectacular property redefines sustainable living, with breathtaking bush surroundings & treetop views that instil a close connection to nature. Enjoy the pleasures of growing your own food, harvesting seasonal organic produce from extensive veggie gardens and orchards, & reaping the rewards of the completed home and landscape renovations. A huge variety of organic fruits, vegetables & olive groves are established, an absolute dream for those interested in self-sufficient living, & endless opportunities for a hobby farmer. The tri level home cleverly links all levels via a clear line of sight from the timber kitchen, a key consideration when supervising children. All new kitchen appliances and reconfigured cabinetry make food preparation a joy, with family meals enjoyed under stunning feature lighting in the dining area. Tinted glass atrium windows reveal a garden thats frequented by Spotted Pardalotes, Eastern Spinebills and New Holland Honeyeaters, to name a few. Freshly painted inside and out, this home has undergone an intensive five-year makeover, transforming it into a clean, functional and beautiful home. Three bedrooms (master with WIR & en-suite) bud off the versatile upper and lower living areas. The spacious north-facing lounge features a raked ceiling with high light windows, polished hardwood flooring, wood fired combustion heating, and a reverse cycle a/c. Large sun-lit spaces on the balcony or patio below beckon you to savour the magnificent, bushland views beyond the grape vine and Wisteria-entwined railings. A large glass-walled studio has the flexibility of being a pool house or retreat space, fully plumbed and powered with timber bifold doors and phantom flyscreen doors. Further enhancing the lifestyle benefits of this property is a salt-chlorinated, solar heated pool (plus a static swim trainer for lap training), that can be used 7-8 months per year, including all new filters, pumps and solar system. 6.3 acres of landscaped grounds reveal lovingly tended gardens, including fully lined, irrigated and frost-netted veggie beds, a state-of-the-art Greenhouse, designated potting benches, chicken coup, sandpit and 100,000ltrs of water storage (including firefighting capacity). An amazing vast mixed orchard of fruit and nut trees has been -planted, employing water-saving permaculture principles, plus a newly re-homed vineyard featuring Cabernet Sauvignon and Shiraz grape vines. A new dam was also built, plus extensive plantings of coastal drought tolerant local species including 120 Manuka trees for the four beehives. Paddocks lend perfectly to horses or limited grazing with two dams and a horse stable. Machinery and vehicle storage is catered to in a large double garage, plus adjoining workshop. Additional improvements include: remote access security system, heat transfer system from the fireplace, new blinds throughout, instant gas hot water system, 3 stage water filter, integrated compost system, Venturi liquid fertiliser system, extensive soil improvement earthworks and revegetation of the entire landscape. This truly is a unique location, offering privacy and an enviable semi-rural lifestyle for your own personal paradise. Enjoy all that the Surf Coast has to offer with close proximity to Bells Beach, Point Addis and the Ironbark Basin nearby, plus easy access to Torquay, Anglesea, Geelong and Melbourne.
Insights: 849 Great Ocean Road, Bellbrae VIC 3228 was last sold in 2014.

Description:
Love the Lifestyle and Location
Showcasing timeless quality and a premium location, this immaculate home is a great choice for lifestyle and comfort. Bathed in light and warmth throughout, the generous open plan family living room and dining area overlook a stylishly presented kitchen, featuring quality stainless steel appliances and plenty of storage space. Offering three spacious bedrooms with ceiling fans, master with walk in robe & ensuite & direct access onto the spacious and private decking. The other two bedrooms feature robes (1 walk in, 1 built in) & are serviced by a modern family bathroom & separate toilet. Entertaining is effortless, with the generous 2nd living area with a gas log fire, which also enjoys easy access to the private deck. Highlights include ducted heating and cooling, double undercover car space with a remote roller door which adjoins the north facing yard. Walk to High St shops for all your lifestyle requirements, walking distance too to local schools & public transport. This home ticks all the boxes, your inspection will not disappoint.

Description:
Quality family home in blue-chip Grovedale.
IMPORTANT NOTICE REGARDING COVID-19:
Open for inspections will no longer be scheduled for the public. To organise your own private viewing, please contact Deane Hughes on 0407 926 659 or Kingston Wade on 0438 033 999.
Situated in a blue-chip pocket of old Grovedale, this beautiful family home has been lovingly maintained and renovated over the years and presents exceptional quality and value in today's market.
Comprising 4 spacious bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, 2 living areas, and a private and secure backyard, this property is sure to appeal to growing families and even investors.
On entry, a large living area welcomes you and flows through to the open plan dining and beautifully renovated kitchen. The kitchen features quality modern cabinetry, 40mm Caesarstone benches, 900mm gas cooktop, and electric oven, glass splashbacks, and overlooks the back yard.
Through glass/timber sliding doors, the beautiful alfresco area provides a great place for year-round entertaining while keeping an eye on the kids in the backyard.
Downstairs, accommodation is comprised of 3 spacious bedrooms all with built-in robes and ceiling fans, serviced by a large central bathroom with a separate toilet.
Upstairs is made up of a large parent's retreat or second living area and a beautiful main bedroom with ensuite, walk-in robe, and beautiful views over Mount Duneed to the Bellarine Peninsula.
Outside, the private and secure backyard is ideal for those with children and pets, and the oversized single garage offers built-in benches and sealed concrete flooring, making it suitable for entertaining in larger numbers.
Noteworthy features include:
- Split systems in Upstairs and Downstairs living areas
- Gas Heating in the downstairs living
- Ceiling fans in all bedrooms
Conveniently located within walking distance to the Grovedale Tennis Courts, Coolabah Park, Burdoo Recreation Reserve, Grovedale High and Primary Schools, as well as being just a few minute's drive to the Waurn Ponds Shopping Mecca, Waurn Ponds Train Station and Deakin University. Enquiry today, before it's too late!

Description:
Family Sized Entertainer With Panoramic Views
Designed with the large family in mind and only a short stroll to the Barrabool Hills Plaza, this quality home is beautifully presented inside and out. You'll love the three large living zones and the stunning views from the huge balcony. An inspection will impress.
- Four bedrooms with robes, master with ensuite and walk in robes
- Flexible floorplan boasts separate study, gym and media zone
- Large kitchen with stone benchtops and stainless appliances
- Spacious lounge, separate family room and a rumpus room
- Huge undercover balcony with panoramic views
- Beautiful polished timber floors. Ducted heating
- Child friendly yard with undercover entertainment area
- Double garage with workshop. Loads of storage space
- Low maintenance native gardens
- Close to all amenities and the Geelong Ring Road
- Belmont High School catchment zone

Description:
Class & Convenience - NEW PRICE!
PLEASE CONTACT ADAM NATONEWSKI FOR A PRIVATE VIEWING
Newly built and oozing simplicity and style throughout, here is a property that can act as a superb base for modern lifestyles on the move. With quick access to the Ring Road on the western side and the charming Highton Village just down the hill to the east, this property will no doubt appeal to those seeking class and convenience.
On entry to the right is a living area that could be also used a study. An open plan kitchen, dining and living area reside at the rear. Brown tones in the cabinetry exude warmth and the caesar stone bench tops are solid and sturdy. The master bedroom upstairs has a walk in robe and ensuite. Two more bedrooms are on the upper level and one of these also includes a walk in robe. Two toilets serve here while a third is in the powder room/laundry downstairs. Ducted heating keeps the house warm and cosy. Tan bark in the rear garden bed ensures maintenance is kept to a minimum. Elevated views of Highton will impress all from the 2nd storey.
Cafes and shopping are not far away in the Highton Village. Also nearby is Barrabool Hills Plaza home to food options, Anytime Fitness 24/7 Gymnasium, Woolworths Supermarket, BWS, Bakery, Medical facilities & Chemist. For a total package that will impress young couples, downsizers and investors alike, this is one not to be missed!

Description:
Your next family home!
Heads up - you should call now to arrange your private inspection because there's a good chance someone else already has!
Whether you're looking for your first family home or deciding to upgrade, this great 4 bedroom home suits just about everyone!
Your huge master with WIR and ensuite is cleverly positioned at the front of the home, while the remaining 3 bedrooms are at the rear and share a central bathroom with separate toilet. One enjoys a view to the alfresco though so prepare for fights when it comes to room selection! Could make for a perfect home office too.
The large open plan kitchen/dining/living is just superb, and extends beautifully onto the alfresco. Entertaining family and friends over summer would be amazing in this space - let's hope we can do that this summer! A second lounge and study nook completes the kids' wing end of the house, all of which can (thank god) be closed off from the rest of the living.
Add in a decent north-facing backyard and being moments to everything like shopping and transport, this property is a no-brainer whichever way you look at it. Only question is - why are you still reading and not calling!?

Description:
Beautiful Family Home!
Private Inspections Welcome - By Appointment Only!
Built by Ron Dennehy this custom built home was designed perfectly and oriented on the site to make the most from the Sun creating a contemporary modern minimalistic family haven. Clean simple lines and large open spaces, enhance the indoor to outdoor areas, creating a fabulous seamless flow.
A bespoke Black Butt high fence hides this unique property from the streetentering the property through a remote sliding gate, you can feel youre in for something special. The exposed aggregate driveway is a special light mix to complement the exterior of the home. A large glass door welcomes you to the house where the gallery foyer invites you into the home. Open plan kitchen, dining and living are the perfect fit for family or guests. The kitchen is streamlined for easy access and seamless preparation of meals. Completing the lower level is a large laundry, powder room and double garage with internal access.
Stunning timber stairs along with feature pendant lighting draw you to the upper level. Here a vast carpeted 2nd living room is central to all the bedrooms. The family bathroom features a custom built timber vanity and bath. Each king size bedroom is carpeted and includes built in robes. The master bedroom en-suite features two vanities, a deep bath and rain shower head. Other great features are stegbar semi commercial double glazed windows and doors, gas log fire, 3000w split system perfect to keep you warm through the winter months and cool through summer.
The rear yard is just like the house, clean simple lines with plenty of grass for the children to play. Walking distance to Whites Beach, The Sands golf course, parkland, childrens playground, day care centres, Torquay Coast Primary School and Torquay College high school, public transport and the new Dunes shopping centre. A perfect location for your new coastal dream home in Torquay.
One of a kindbook an inspection today.
Note: Photo id with current address must be provided at all open for inspections due to Covid 19 restrictions.
Insights: 36 Aerial Avenue, Torquay VIC 3228 was last sold in 2020 and 139 other 4 bedroom house in Torquay have recently been sold.

Description:
A minutes stroll to Fishermans beach!
Youll love:
This designer townhouses unbeatable location in Old Torquay: directly opposite Taylor Park with the Esplanade, beach & shops all just a couple hundred metres away!
The ground floors private, sunny & spacious courtyard garden oasis coupled by another generous, north-facing courtyard off the 2nd living area upstairs.
Listening to birdsong while admiring the sea view over Fishermans beach - all from a 3rd generous outdoor space located off the upstairs bedroom.
A kitchen thats super spacious & fully equipped with stainless steel appliances, granite look bench tops & a large island bench thats perfect for casual dining.
Plus:
All three bedrooms have generous BIRs, while the ground floor bedroom connects to a bathroom thats suitable for people with mobility issues.
Other downstairs features include: high ceilings throughout, an open plan living/kitchen/meals area that opens into the main courtyard, a euro-style laundry plus plenty of additional storage space.
Upstairs also includes a family-sized bathroom with a shower & bath, a separate toilet and a generous study nook.
Theres also split system heating/cooling on both levels, continuous gas hot water, a double remote garage & loads more to love about this quality low maintenance & lifestyle opportunity.

Description:
Value and Location
Positioned perfectly in the heart of Grovedale, this solid home presents an exciting opportunity for a first homebuyer to enter the market or the astute investor looking to expand their portfolio. The home allows you to move in with absolute ease but would certainly respond well to a modern transformation depending on your needs and wants.
The generous floor plan starts with the large light filled lounge with gas heater, next to this is the central kitchen which is very functional offering ample storage. This overlooks the dining area and a step down into the second living space, offering split system heating and cooling. Completing the home is three good-sized bedrooms, all serviced by the central bathroom with separate toilet. Heading outside you find established gardens with an undercover entertaining area adjoining the man cave /games room perfect for teenagers or even a great workshop.
You will enjoy a convenient lifestyle being only a short drive to Waurn Ponds Shopping Centre, Deakin University, The Epworth hospital and train station. Across the road from Grovedale Community Centre, a short walk to IGA, Grovedale West Primary and Grovedale Secondary College. With public transport at your doorstep, homes like this in Grovedale dont last long, so get in touch now to inspect.

Description:
Exclusive Pocket, Entry Level Price
"This Property Won't Last Long"
This rare find is absolutely banging on the door of opportunity in one of Highton's most exclusive pockets; synonymous with beautiful tree lined streets, views over the Highton hills and quality schools. Choices aplenty to invest, reside, subdivide, renovate, or simply set and forget in one of Geelong's top performing suburbs for capital growth.
Main Features:
• 3 Large Bedrooms with BIR, Central Bath & Separate W/C
• Light Bright L-Shaped Main Living Area/Dinning Zone with RC/AC & Gas Heater
• Spacious Kitchen with New Gas Cooktop & Fan Force Oven
• Corner Allotment on Approx. 612m�
• Secure and Fully Fenced with a Single Car Garage
The current owners are on the move, so seize the possibility to conservatively enter the property market in one of Highton's most livable streets surrounded by local amenities, public transport, Deakin University, Waurn Ponds Shopping Center, Highton Village and Geelong's Ring Rd. Description:
Ideal First Home, Downsizer or Investment
If you have been looking for the perfect excuse NOT to build, then your wish has come true with this wonderful family home in highly sought-after Leopold! Only 4 years old, this delightfully presented single level brick home offers superior quality and functional design throughout. Comprising 3 Bedrooms, all with built in robes, master with full ensuite, including large shower. The other 2 bedrooms are serviced by a central family bathroom and separate toilet. The modern quality kitchen features an island bench, electric oven, gas stove top, dishwasher, large pantry and loads of storage. A clever floorplan offers a generous open plan dining and living zone. Outside you will find low maintenance front and back garden areas and a double remote garage with internal access. Other features include: ducted gas heating, split system heating & cooling to the kitchen/dining/living area, gas hot water service, and quality flooring throughout.
This home represents outstanding value set in a quiet street surrounded by quality homes and all of Leopolds great amenities including local schools, Gateway Plaza Shopping Centre, medical, cafes, local restaurants, transport, sporting facilities and 10 minutes from some of the Bellarines finest wineries, beaches and attractions. This is sure to be snapped up fast, dont miss your chance and call today for a private inspection.

Description:
Charming Character home on 814m²! Inspection a Must!
First Home Buyers this is the one you have been waiting for. Developers opportunity presents here with this home set on a large 814m² allotment, loads of potential for redevelopment (STCA) in the future. A stunning characteristic weatherboard home features two bedrooms with built in robes, main bathroom and separate laundry. Open plan kitchen/dining/family areas complimented by polished floorboards, a wood fire heater and reverse cycle air-conditioning. An ideal place to relax and unwind. Outdoors there's an undercover entertaining deck overlooking the secure backyard with established gardens and garden shed. There is plenty of room for off-street parking including a single lock up garage. An expected rental return of $330 - $350pw. Conveniently located within walking distance to Marshall station, ideal for commuting to Melbourne and Geelong via train and bus services. Only a short drive to the Surf Coast and Barwon Heads. Fall in love with this home the moment you step inside. Call agent for a private inspection.

Description:
Your own rural haven...
If you love a country atmosphere with the benefits of city living, here's the perfect hideaway. Only a 5 minute drive to Geelong CBD &10 minutes to coastal areas, the location of this hidden gem screams convenience whilst offering all the relaxing benefits of a rural retreat.
On a large allotment of 4,007sqm in a secluded cul de sac, this property offers a peaceful outlook of neighbouring farmland, minutes to Bellarine Village, local schools & public transport. This low maintenance home will leave you free to enjoy your downtime. Go practice your golf swing in the park or walk the kids to Splashdown for a swim.
This 6 y.o home is architecturally designed to enjoy the benefits of a northerly aspect & eco-friendly living, providing a 6 star energy rating. The external Linea weatherboards save painting in years to come & act as a great insulator, keeping the home warm in winter & cool in summer. The windows are double glazed, the positioning of the home allows plenty of natural light & the stylish allergy friendly bamboo flooring is ideal for easy maintenance. 5kW solar panels, solar hot water system & a 25,000 l rainwater tank keep energy & water bills to a minimum.
Comprising a wide entrance, sun drenched dining/living room plus a 2nd family/lounge area. The well appointed kitchen has plenty of storage space, a walk in pantry, stone benchtops, 2 Pac finish, glass splashback, gas cooktop, 1 ½ electric ovens & a dishwasher. There are 4 bdms, 3 have BIRs, the master has a WIR/ensuite. The central family bathroom has a separate bath & shower & separate toilet. Ducted vacuum throughout.
Outdoors is an impressive undercover area, ideal for enjoying the view of surrounding paddocks & farm animals & taking in this peaceful atmosphere.
The large allotment is a blank canvas, with plenty of room for the addition of more gardens, fruit trees or a pool. The huge shed is every tradies dream, measuring 7.5m x 17.5m, providing ample storage for extra cars, boat, trailer or a workshop. There is also a r/c DG with internal access to the home.
Opportunities like this are few & far between. Inspect & secure as your own, then sit back & enjoy the serenity of this beautiful rural setting.
All information is provided by third parties. You are advised to make your own enquiries regarding the accuracy of information relating to properties. Eastwood Andrews will not be liable for any loss resulting from any action or decision by you in reliance to information supplied.
